abstract: Sean Avery cleared waivers Wednesday and was assigned by the Rangers to their American League team.
snippet: Sean Avery cleared waivers Wednesday and was assigned by the Rangers to their American League team.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers agitator Sean Avery cleared N.H.L. waivers on Wednesday, 24 hours after the Rangers placed him there. He was assigned to the team's American Hockey League affiliate in Hartford, the Connecticut Whale.
